titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide eligibility for astronauts for Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance.
A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide eligibility for astronauts for Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: Makes National Aeronautics and Space Administration command pilots, pilots, or mission specialists eligible for Servicemembers' Group Life Insurance provided through the Department of Veterans Affairs.
